# External PLCopen XML Samples

This folder contains third-party PLCopen XML samples used for manual compatibility checks.

## Sources

| Local file | Upstream source (pinned) | License |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `codesys-speed-tests.xml` | `tkucic/codesys_code_execution_speedTests@d3abcf45935e6d46f526c186ab0ba5cc46f23cb2` | MIT |
| `math-expression-evaluator.xml` | `WitchCraftWorks/IEC61131-3-CDSV3@28968103d6fce99355938f7a64f7b090c51e3296` | MIT |
| `mixing-tank.xml` | `tkucic/plc_hello_mixing_tank@17e0213b1c7c46fd44ff7d9a52a6bb9e500d65de` | MIT |
| `siemens.xml` | `johannesPettersson80/trust-platform@808bfe8d9d1aff9d8cab8a673ec94ad9d7491cb4` | Apache-2.0 |
| `rockwell.xml` | `johannesPettersson80/trust-platform@808bfe8d9d1aff9d8cab8a673ec94ad9d7491cb4` | Apache-2.0 |

- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tkucic/plc_hello_mixing_tank/17e0213b1c7c46fd44ff7d9a52a6bb9e500d65de/plc_hello_mixing_tank.xml
